author: Special Correspondent
text: Kadayam police have arrested a 29-year-old man, A. Thiruchelvan of Manalkattanur, for allegedly sexually assaulting a class XI student. The police said that Thiruchelvan sexually assaulted the 17-year-old girl from the same area on Monday. Based on a complaint from the girl’s mother, the police arrested him.
title: Man held for sexually assaulting girl
